price: او له هغو نه پرده نيولې (ناسته وه)، نو هغې ته مو خپل روح (جبرائيل) ورولېږلو او هغه ورته بالكل د يو بشر په شكل ورڅرګند شو.
arabic: فَٱتَّخَذَتۡ مِن دُونِهِمۡ حِجَابٗا فَأَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَرٗا سَوِيّٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fa-ittakhadhat min dūnihim ḥijāban fa-arsalnā ilayhā rūḥanā fatamathala lahā basharan sawiyyan
translations: then he assumed for her the likeness
then he assumed for her the likeness
